      • Methods inherited from interface org.trianacode.taskgraph.Cable

    • Method Detail

      • isDataReady

        boolean isDataReady()
        Returns:
        true if the data is ready to be collected

      • recv

        java.lang.Object recv()
        Returns the data from if there is data there. If not then this function returns NOT_READY if the data is not ready to be received or NOT_CONNECTED if there is no cable connected to the input.

      • suspend

        void suspend()
        Suspends the pipe. Any new data sent to the pipe should be ignored.

      • flush

        void flush()
        Flushes data in the pipe

      • resume

        void resume()
        Unsuspends a pipe
